channel.title: Dementhium Command
channel.description:
command for admins:
::resettask USERNAME (resets that players slayer task)
::assigntask USERNAME NPCID AMOUNT (assigns the player the selected slayer task)
If someone can make that command for me it will be greatly appreciated!!

item.title: Dementhium Command
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[code=java]
if (args[0].equals(“resettask”) {
// setCurrentTask(-1);
}

if (args[0].equals("assigntask") {
    final String name = args[1];
    final int npcId = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
    final int amount = Integer.parseInt(args[3]);
    // setTask(String, int, int);
}[/code]

I’ve never used Dementhium, I wouldn’t be able to give you exact commands. Sorry.
